external_games.name: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind

name: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind
summary: The Crash: Storm Clouds of the Mind is an English Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. The game uses Alice in Wonderland as its theme mixed with 1960's aesthetic. You play as Elizabeth, a young 1960's college student who is having weird dreams. The goal is to explore and collect effects. The player can collect items hidden in the dream world as well.
